channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Guard Extensions Platform Software Component for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Guard Extensions Platform Software Component for Linux

item.title: CVE-2018-3689|2024-08-05T04:50:30.324Z -- intel%20corporation -- guard%20extensions%20platform%20software%20component%20for%20linux
item.description: AESM daemon in Intel Software Guard Extensions Platform Software Component for Linux before 2.1.102 can effectively be disabled by a local attacker creating a denial of services like remote attestation provided by the AESM.
